duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce original news content for broadcast, including research, conducting interviews, writing and editing scripts, field producing and shooting, overseeing editing, and producing live newsmaker segments.
Pitch story ideas and work on assigned stories developed by the editorial team.
Ensure Editorial Standards of all segments with the Standards & Legal Team.
Produce both tape spots (news and feature stories) and live segments.
Produce live guests for newsmakers, various consumer, medical and/or lifestyle segments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in journalism, communications or related discipline (Master's preferred)
